title: [Large-Scale] Online Collaborative Science Learning Design and Implementation Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental science concepts and experience with digital collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Aims to develop competencies in designing and implementing science education using online collaborative learning for corporate elementary education personnel. Conducted in a BYOD environment with a blended approach combining twice-weekly face-to-face sessions and asynchronous online activities.

learning_goals: Learners can iteratively revise designs at least twice using knowledge activation scope, knowledge construction levels, and interaction metrics when designing online collaborative learning
Learners can identify at least three mismatches between collaborative learning design and implementation by analyzing interaction path graphs
Learners can improve group performance metrics (task completion, creativity) by 20% or more compared to the first iteration through repeated design improvements

resources: Science Education Resource Kit (Lab Guide, Digital Content)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
